|default_ssid=zoomXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^zoom[0-9]{4}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:01:38 |oui_eth=00:01:38 }} "X7868-ZOOM VER:1.2" and "2005.01.18" is silkscreened on the board used to populate this entry. :The board is using two differing brands of radial capacitors - '''TAICON''' (power section) and '''CUSHY''' (main board, all are - as of 2013 - swollen or ruptured).
'''Additional info...''' :The ''Argon 432'' SoC is labeled with.. :*The '''Conexant''' logo :*DA4-9431-PCA Z :*0609 Taiwan :*0608GWJ9-A3 :*'''ARMâ„¢''' :The Mini PCI card is using ISL3886IKZ.
The OUI used by the device, for both interfaces, is presumed to be 00:01:38 ('''XAVi''').
